languages.text: "Мы — пламень познания, что изгоняет тьму". {n}Паскаль торопливо инспектирует раны пленного техножреца, не обращая внимания на кровь и священное масло, марающие рукава. Его вокс успокаивающе бормочет:{/n} "Не страшись грядущего, брат. Мы уже здесь".

"We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."
languages.original_text: "Мы — пламень познания, что изгоняет тьму". {n}Паскаль торопливо инспектирует раны пленного техножреца, не обращая внимания на кровь и священное масло, марающие рукава. Его вокс успокаивающе бормочет:{/n} "Не страшись грядущего, брат. Мы уже здесь".

traits.locale_text: "We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

"We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

"We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

"We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

"We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

languages.text: "Wir sind die Flamme des Wissens, die die Dunkelheit vertreibt." {n}Pasqal inspiziert rasch Abels Wunden, ohne sich am Blut und den heiligen Salben an seinen Ärmeln zu stören. Sein Vox krächzt besänftigend.{/n} "Fürchtet nicht, was kommt, Bruder. Wir sind schon hier."
languages.original_text: "We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind die Flamme des Wissens, die die Dunkelheit vertreibt." {n}Pasqal inspiziert rasch Abels Wunden, ohne sich am Blut und den heiligen Salben an seinen Ärmeln zu stören. Sein Vox krächzt besänftigend.{/n} "Fürchtet nicht, was kommt, Bruder. Wir sind schon hier."

languages.text: « Nous sommes la flamme de la Connaissance qui repousse les ténèbres. » {n}Pasqal examine rapidement les blessures d'Abel, sans se préoccuper du sang et des onguents sacrés qui tachent ses manches. Son vox crache d'une voix râpeuse, mais apaisante :{/n} « Ne craignez pas ce qui va arriver, frère. Nous sommes là. »
languages.original_text: "We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes la flamme de la Connaissance qui repousse les ténèbres. » {n}Pasqal examine rapidement les blessures d'Abel, sans se préoccuper du sang et des onguents sacrés qui tachent ses manches. Son vox crache d'une voix râpeuse, mais apaisante :{/n} « Ne craignez pas ce qui va arriver, frère. Nous sommes là. »

languages.text: “我们是驱散黑暗的知识之火。”{n}帕斯卡正在迅速检查着亚伯的伤口，完全不在意自己袖子上沾上的血迹与神圣机油。他的音阵系统传来了安抚的沙沙声。{/n}“不必害怕即将发生的事情，我的兄弟。我们已经来了。”
languages.original_text: "We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

traits.locale_text: “我们是驱散黑暗的知识之火。”{n}帕斯卡正在迅速检查着亚伯的伤口，完全不在意自己袖子上沾上的血迹与神圣机油。他的音阵系统传来了安抚的沙沙声。{/n}“不必害怕即将发生的事情，我的兄弟。我们已经来了。”

languages.text: 「我々は闇を追い払う知識の炎だ」{n}パスカルは袖が血や聖なる軟膏で汚れることなど気にも留めず、素早くアベルの傷を調べている。彼のヴォクスは宥めるような音を立てた。{/n}「同胞よ、これから起こることを恐れぬように。自分たちはすでにここまで来たのだ」
languages.original_text: "We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は闇を追い払う知識の炎だ」{n}パスカルは袖が血や聖なる軟膏で汚れることなど気にも留めないで、素早くアベルの傷を調べている。彼のヴォクスは宥めるように音を立てた。{/n}「同胞よ、これから起こることを恐れぬように。私たちはすでにここまで来たのだ」

languages.text: «Somos la llama del Conocimiento que ahuyenta la oscuridad». {n}Pasqal inspecciona rápidamente las heridas de Abel, sin prestar atención a la sangre y los ungüentos sagrados que manchan sus mangas. Su voco ronca suavemente:{/n} «No tema lo que está por venir, hermano. Ya estamos aquí».
languages.original_text: "We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

traits.locale_text: «Somos la llama del Conocimiento que ahuyenta la oscuridad». {n}Pasqal inspecciona rápidamente las heridas de Abel, sin prestar atención a la sangre y los ungüentos sagrados que manchan sus mangas. Su voco ronca suavemente:{/n} «No tema lo que está por venir, hermano. Ya estamos aquí».

languages.text: "Biz, karanlığı süren İrfanın aleviyiz." {n}Pasqal, Abel'in yaralarını alelacele incelerken cübbesinin kollarına bulaşan kanı ve kutsal özyağı görmezden geliyor. Voksu, teskin edercesine cızırdıyor.{/n} "Gelmekte olandan korkma kardeşim. Zira çoktan vardık."
languages.original_text: "We are the flame of Knowledge that drives the darkness away." {n}Pasqal is quickly inspecting Abel's wounds, paying no mind to the blood and sacred unguents staining his sleeves. His vox rasps soothingly,{/n} "Do not fear what is to come, brother. We are already here."

traits.locale_text: "Biz, karanlığı aydınlatan İrfanın aleviyiz." {n}Pasqal, alelacele Abel'in yaralarını incelerken manşetlerine bulaşan kanı ve kutsal özyağı görmezden geliyor. Voksu, teskin edercesine cızırdıyor.{/n} "Gelmekte olandan korkma kardeşim. Çoktan vardık."
